nodes.bodyText: Remove redundant section ", and keep getting updated"
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -84,6 +84,17 @@ The transactions table contains the list of currently open transactions
 and related metadata. This includes information such as the create time,
 idle time, initialization parameters, and accessed catalogs.
 
+``runtime.optimizer_rule_stats``
+^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
+
+The optimizer_rule_stats table contains the statistics for optimizer
+rule invocations during query planning phase. The statistics are aggregated
+over all queries since the server start-up, and keep getting updated.

@@ -84,6 +84,17 @@ The transactions table contains the list of currently open transactions

@@ -84,6 +84,17 @@ The transactions table contains the list of currently open transactions
 and related metadata. This includes information such as the create time,
 idle time, initialization parameters, and accessed catalogs.
 
+``runtime.optimizer_rule_stats``
+^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
+
+The optimizer_rule_stats table contains the statistics for optimizer
+rule invocations during query planning phase. The statistics are aggregated
+over all queries since the server start-up, and keep getting updated.
+From this table you can find out invocation frequency, failure rates and
